author: Flo (tonebytone)
content:
The cost to travel to either city is the same, apparently. The guy seems to be headed for Hamburg on the right. Or maybe one has to walk in that direction to the gates to all cities? He looks tired, or maybe he's not too happy about making this trip, or maybe his bag is very heavy. Viewers can make up their own stories, because you have provided us with a mystery.

Hugs,
Flo
